IGNORE_ERROR:drop table BCK_SEQ_SCEN

create table BCK_SEQ_SCEN (
SCEN_NO NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(436) NOT NULL ,
INCR NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
IND_STD VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
STD_MAX NUMERIC(10) NULL ,
SPC_TAB VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_COL VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DB_SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE_TXT LONGVARCHAR NULL
)

insert into BCK_SEQ_SCEN (
SCEN_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
) select
SCEN_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
from SNP_SEQ_SCEN
drop table SNP_SEQ_SCEN

create table SNP_SEQ_SCEN (
SCEN_NO NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(436) NOT NULL ,
INCR NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
IND_STD VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
STD_MAX NUMERIC(10) NULL ,
SPC_TAB VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_COL VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DB_SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE_TXT LONGVARCHAR NULL
, CONSTRAINT PK_SEQ_SCEN PRIMARY KEY ( SCEN_NO , SEQ_NAME )
)

insert into SNP_SEQ_SCEN (
SCEN_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
) select
SCEN_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
from BCK_SEQ_SCEN
drop table BCK_SEQ_SCEN
IGNORE_ERROR:drop table BCK_SEQ_SESS

create table BCK_SEQ_SESS (
SESS_NO NUMERIC(19) NOT NULL ,
SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(436) NOT NULL ,
INCR NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
IND_STD VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
STD_MAX NUMERIC(10) NULL ,
SPC_TAB VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_COL VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DB_SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE_TXT LONGVARCHAR NULL
)

insert into BCK_SEQ_SESS (
SESS_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
) select
SESS_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
from SNP_SEQ_SESS
drop table SNP_SEQ_SESS

create table SNP_SEQ_SESS (
SESS_NO NUMERIC(19) NOT NULL ,
SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(436) NOT NULL ,
INCR NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
IND_STD VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
STD_MAX NUMERIC(10) NULL ,
SPC_TAB VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_COL VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DB_SEQ_NAME VARCHAR(128) NULL ,
SPC_WHERE_TXT LONGVARCHAR NULL
, CONSTRAINT PK_SEQ_SESS PRIMARY KEY ( SESS_NO , SEQ_NAME )
)

insert into SNP_SEQ_SESS (
SESS_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
) select
SESS_NO ,
SEQ_NAME ,
INCR ,
IND_STD ,
STD_MAX ,
SPC_TAB ,
SPC_COL ,
SPC_WHERE ,
LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DB_SEQ_NAME
from BCK_SEQ_SESS
drop table BCK_SEQ_SESS
alter table SNP_LOAD_PLAN add constraint AK_LOAD_PLAN unique ( LOAD_PLAN_NAME )
alter table SNP_SCEN add constraint AK_SCEN unique ( SCEN_NAME , SCEN_VERSION )
alter table SNP_SCEN_FOLDER add constraint AK_SCEN_FOLDER unique ( PAR_I_SCEN_FOLDER , SCEN_FOLDER_NAME )
alter table SNP_SESS_FOLDER add constraint AK_SESS_FOLDER unique ( FOLDER_NAME )
create index LPIRPARAM_LPIR_FK on SNP_PARAM_LPI_RUN ( I_LP_INST , NB_RUN )
create index LPI_ELOG_SLOG_FK on SNP_LPI_EXC_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN )
create index LPI_ELOG_STEP_FK on SNP_LPI_EXC_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT )
create index LPI_RUN_LPI_FK on SNP_LPI_RUN ( I_LP_INST )
create index LPI_SLOG_RUN_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG ( I_LP_INST , NB_RUN )
create index LPI_SLOG_STEP_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP )
create index LPI_STEP_EXC_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT )
create index LPI_STEP_LPI_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST )
create index LPI_STEP_STEP_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST , PAR_I_LP_STEP )
create index LPI_STEP_VAR_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME )
create index LPI_SVAR_STEP_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP )
create index LPI_SVAR_VAR_FK on SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME )
create index LPI_VAR_LPI_FK on SNP_LPI_VAR ( I_LP_INST )
create index LPI_VLOG_SLOG_FK on SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN )
create index LPI_VLOG_SVAR_FK on SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , VAR_NAME )
create index LP_SCEN_FOLD_FK on SNP_LOAD_PLAN ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
create index LP_STEP_EXC_FK on SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT )
create index LP_STEP_LP_FK on SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
create index LP_STEP_STEP_FK on SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , PAR_I_LP_STEP )
create index LP_STEP_VAR_FK on SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
create index LP_STVAR_STEP_FK on SNP_LP_STEP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
create index LP_STVAR_VAR_FK on SNP_LP_STEP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
create index LP_VAR_LP_FK on SNP_LP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
create index PARAM_SESS_FK on SNP_PARAM_SESS ( SESS_NO )
create index SNP_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_SCEN ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
create index SCEN_REPORT_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_REPORT ( SCEN_NO )
create index SCEN_STEP_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_STEP ( SCEN_NO )
create index SCEN_TASK_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_TASK ( SCEN_NO , NNO )
create index SCEN_TXT_FK1 on SNP_SCEN_TXT ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index SEQ_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_SEQ_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
create index SEQ_SESS_FK1 on SNP_SEQ_SESS ( SESS_NO )
create index SESS_LS_SEQ_FK on SNP_SESS_TASK_LS ( SESS_NO , SEQ_NAME )
create index SESS_LV_VAR_FK on SNP_SESS_STEP_LV ( SESS_NO , VAR_NAME )
create index SESS_STEP_FK1 on SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO )
create index SESS_STEP_LV_FK on SNP_SESS_STEP_LV ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
create index SESS_TASK_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TASK ( SESS_NO , NNO )
create index SESS_TASK_LOG_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( NNO , SESS_NO , NB_RUN )
create index SESS_TASK_LS_FK on SNP_SESS_TASK_LS ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index SESS_TXT_LOG_FK1 on SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index VAR_PLAN_AGENT_FK1 on SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
create index STEP_LOG_FK1 on SNP_STEP_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO )
create index STEP_REPORT_FK1 on SNP_STEP_REPORT ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
create index TASK_TXT_FK1 on SNP_TASK_TXT ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
create index VAR_SCEN_FK1 on SNP_VAR_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
create index VAR_SESS_FK1 on SNP_VAR_SESS ( SESS_NO )
alter table SNP_PARAM_LPI_RUN add constraint FK_LPIRPARAM_LPIR foreign key ( I_LP_INST , NB_RUN ) references SNP_LPI_RUN ( I_LP_INST , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_LPI_EXC_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_ELOG_SLOG foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN ) references SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_LPI_EXC_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_ELOG_STEP foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT ) references SNP_LPI_STEP ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LPI_RUN add constraint FK_LPI_RUN_LPI foreign key ( I_LP_INST ) references SNP_LP_INST ( I_LP_INST )

alter table SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LPI_SVAR_VAR foreign key ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LPI_VAR ( I_LP_INST , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR add constraint FK_LPI_VAR_LPI foreign key ( I_LP_INST ) references SNP_LP_INST ( I_LP_INST )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_VLOG_SLOG foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN ) references SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , NB_RUN )
alter table SNP_LPI_VAR_LOG add constraint FK_LPI_VLOG_SVAR foreign key ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LPI_STEP_VAR ( I_LP_INST , I_LP_STEP , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LOAD_PLAN add constraint FK_LP_SCEN_FOLD foreign key ( I_SCEN_FOLDER ) references SNP_SCEN_FOLDER ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_EXC foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_LP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN ) references SNP_LOAD_PLAN ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_STEP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , PAR_I_LP_STEP ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP add constraint FK_LP_STEP_VAR foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_STVAR_STEP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP ) references SNP_LP_STEP ( I_LOAD_PLAN , I_LP_STEP )
alter table SNP_LP_STEP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_STVAR_VAR foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME ) references SNP_LP_VAR ( I_LOAD_PLAN , VAR_NAME )
alter table SNP_LP_VAR add constraint FK_LP_VAR_LP foreign key ( I_LOAD_PLAN ) references SNP_LOAD_PLAN ( I_LOAD_PLAN )
alter table SNP_PARAM_SESS add constraint FK_PARAM_SESS foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN add constraint FK_SCEN_FOLDER foreign key ( I_SCEN_FOLDER ) references SNP_SCEN_FOLDER ( I_SCEN_FOLDER )
alter table SNP_SCEN_REPORT add constraint FK_SCEN_REPORT foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_STEP add constraint FK_SCEN_STEP foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TASK add constraint FK_SCEN_TASK foreign key ( SCEN_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SCEN_STEP ( SCEN_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_SCEN_TXT add constraint FK_SCEN_TXT foreign key ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SCEN_TASK ( SCEN_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )

alter table SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG add constraint FK_SESS_TXT_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG ( SESS_NO , NNO , NB_RUN , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_PLAN_AGENT add constraint FK_SNP_PLAN_AGENT foreign key ( I_PLAN_AGENT ) references SNP_PLAN_AGENT ( I_PLAN_AGENT )
alter table SNP_STEP_LOG add constraint FK_STEP_LOG foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO ) references SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO , NNO )
alter table SNP_STEP_REPORT add constraint FK_STEP_REPORT foreign key ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN_REPORT ( SCEN_NO , SCEN_RUN_NO )
alter table SNP_TASK_TXT add constraint FK_TASK_TXT foreign key ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO ) references SNP_SESS_TASK ( SESS_NO , NNO , SCEN_TASK_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SCEN add constraint FK_VAR_SCEN foreign key ( SCEN_NO ) references SNP_SCEN ( SCEN_NO )
alter table SNP_VAR_SESS add constraint FK_VAR_SESS foreign key ( SESS_NO ) references SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO )
